info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 18 at 8:05PM CDT until August 21 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Turtle Creek Near Austin 3NW affecting Mower County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cedar River at Austin affecting Mower County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Turtle Creek near Austin 3NW.
* WHEN...Until early Thursday morning.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 7.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Monday was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.7 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.6 feet on 06/22/2024. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued this evening by 915 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING
